bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Replacement Parts for Class 1E Equipment in Nuclear Power Generating Stations
IEEE Standard Requirements for Replacement Parts for Class 1E Equipment in Nuclear Power Generating Stations

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The standard sets forth basic requirements for the selection and utilization of replacement parts for Class IE equipment in nuclear power generating stations, in both the construction and operating phases.<>

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
